    level="1"
    right="Item 10"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Grounding Spike](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1874)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Evocation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=65" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 34 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

**Price** 950 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 1 hand

**Bulk** 1
</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Base Weapon** [Dancer's Spear](/Weapons.aspx?ID=279)
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

Metal caps the bottom of this _+1 [striking](/Equipment.aspx?ID=280) [thundering](/Equipment.aspx?ID=306) [dancer's spear](/Weapons.aspx?ID=279)_ and its point gives off the faint smell of ozone. If you hit a target that has been struck by a _[polarizing mace](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1875)_ within the last round, you deal additional electricity damage to the target equal to the number of _grounding spike's_ damage dice. If you critically hit such a target, the creature is [flat-footed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=16) until the start of your next turn.

 **Special** The _grounding spike_ pairs with the _polarizing mace_.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Grounding Spike
